src:
きゃりー、原宿で披露“ファッションショー”

07 Nov 2019

　歌手でモデルのきゃりーぱみゅぱみゅ（２６）が６日、都内で、スマホ決済「メルペイ」新キャンペーン発表会に出席。その後、原宿・竹下通りのクレープ店で「メルペイ」体験を行った。
　「メルペイ」の新ＣＭに出演するきゃりー。発表会ではＣＭ撮影時と同じ、爽やかな水色のワンピースで登場し、「最近はブルーにハマっていて、お財布もブルーです」とマイブームを披露した。約１時間半後にはチェック柄の衣装で竹下通りに出現。わずかな時間で髪型と衣装をガラッと変える“ファッションモンスター”ぶりを発揮していた。
text:
Kyary, “Fashion Show” at Harajuku

07 Nov 2019

Singer and model Kyary Pamyu Pamyu (26) attended the smartphone campaign “Melpay” new campaign announcement in Tokyo on the 6th. After that, we had a “Melpay” experience at a crepe store in Harajuku and Takeshita Street.
KYARA will appear in the new commercial for "MELPAY". At the recital, she appeared in a refreshing light blue dress that was the same as when shooting commercials, and she showed off my boom saying "I'm addicted to blue these days and my wallet is blue." About an hour and a half later, it appeared on Takeshita Street in a checkered costume. In a short amount of time, he showed off his “fashion monster” for the first time, changing his hairstyle and costume.
